name: Stranded (itch) (Deckard11)
description:
The world is overrun by the living dead. How long has it been since this all started? How long have you been on the road? You have been driving for so long without rest...  You close your eyes for a moment and when you open them you are speeding towards a tree. Now your only means of escape is wrecked. You know they are coming. This is your last stand. There is no help on the way. You are Stranded.

This is my first game as a hobbyist. I specifically made it to be simple and emphasized things that I wanted to test out for future games. I hope you like it!
